entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:46 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 11:48 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:25 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:25 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:25 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
